subject: Order # 114-6983051-3723410
description_text:
Good afternoon,

I ordered the SIMSONN PRO X Ultra Sim Racing Pedals that includes the
heightening and heel plates. I made my purchase on Amazon. I received the
ordered today and I am missing the both the heightening plate and the heel
plate. Is it possible to have those parts sent to me?

Here is the tracking number as well, 887419080434

I have attached pictures to show what I received.

Best regards,
Tiffany Flowers

conversations.body_text: In total I'm missing 3 parts; base plate, RBG heel plate, and heightening plate
Hi Tiffany,  The tracking number for the base plate is 1ZJ201H40323093305 ; the shipping carrier is UPS, and you can track it via https://www.ups.com/track.

I received the base plate, heel plate, and heightening plate, however I did
not receive the wiring for the heel plate to plug the lights in. Could you
please send that to me and Ill have the completed order. Thank you.

On Sun, Jan 4, 2026, 12:38 AM support @simsonn.com
Hi Tiffany,  Could you please check the brake pedal? The brake pedal has two wires, one of which is used to connect to the RGB light strip

Hello, I found it last night. Everything is all set now. Thank you so much
for such amazing customer service.

On Wed, Jan 7, 2026, 3:12 AM support @simsonn.com
